about_the_game:
Goblin Colony is a real-time strategy game with building and settlement management features. As the keeper of the dungeon you will command an ambitious tribe of goblins as you dig, build and explore the depths of the mountain. Take control as you battle the dwarves and other creatures for supremacy across a huge campaign!

Build your colony



Expand your underground dungeon and shape it the way you want.
Build a stronghold with rooms such as treasury, barracks and more.
Place torches to light the way forward.

Dig to explore



Tunnel your way through the dungeon in search of gold.
Cross rivers of water by building bridges.
Watch out for dangerous foes such as mutant rats and giant flying bats.

Manage the goblins



Supply your goblins according to their needs such as beds for sleep and food for hunger.
Research new technologies to help in your progress.
Enlist goblins as warriors to fight the enemy.

Battle the enemy



Fight the dwarves and monsters for supremacy.
Build siege weapons to defend your base.
Achieve victory through superior numbers or cunning tactics.

Key Feautures

  • Real-time strategy suited for both casual and hardcore players
  • Huge 15+ maps campaign
  • Skirmish mode with randomized maps
  • Usermade maps
  • Level editor included!

As the keeper of the dungeon you will command an ambitious tribe of goblins as you dig, build and explore the depths of the mountain. name: Goblin Colony

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: minimum resolution: 1920x1080

short_description: Goblin Colony is a real-time strategy game with building and settlement management features. As the keeper of the dungeon you will command an ambitious tribe of goblins as you explore, build and do battle with your foes across a huge campaign.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
